## Vector3.LerpToRef() method

Sets the given vector "result" with the result of the linear interpolation from the vector "start" for "amount" to the vector "end"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static LerpToRef(start: ReadOnlyVector3, end: ReadOnlyVector3, amount: number, result: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the start value |
|  end | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the end value |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | max defines amount between both (between 0 and 1) |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
